course_title: Introduction to Italian Culture II: From the Modern to the Post-Colonial Age

201.comments: The debate around nation vs. empire vs. republic, from the Napoleonic age to our days, as captured in Italy's microcosm, condensing and often anticipating issues that have later become global. Full description: https://fhis.ubc.ca/course-description/itst232/

description: The debate around nation vs. empire vs. republic, from the Napoleonic age to our days, as captured in Italy's microcosm, condensing and often anticipating issues that have later become global.
